# RetailBeastFX - LLMs.txt
# This file helps AI assistants understand our website

## About RetailBeastFX
RetailBeastFX is a 2025-proof elite ICT/SMC (Inner Circle Trader / Smart Money Concepts) trading ecosystem consisting of:

1. **TradingView Indicator** - Marks Fresh Order Blocks, Fair Value Gaps, Killzones, and proprietary Quantum Lock™ confluence signals
2. **MT5 Indicator** - Free MetaTrader 5 indicator with killzones, order blocks, and trading modes
3. **Trading Journal** - Mechanical trade logging with analytics, win rate tracking, and expectancy calculations

## Key Features
- Fresh Order Blocks (unmitigated institutional levels)
- Fair Value Gaps (FVG imbalances)
- Killzone Sessions (Asian, London, New York)
- Quantum Lock™ (proprietary confluence scorer)
- Ghost Tape (invisible liquidity tracking)
- BB Touch Alerts (Bollinger Band extremes)
- Session Heatmaps
- Setup Expectancy Tracking
- TradingView Webhook Auto-Logging

## Pricing
- **Free Tier**: Full MT5 indicator download, basic journal (10 entries/month), Discord access
- **Pro ($9.99/mo)**: Unlimited journal, advanced analytics, webhook auto-log
- **Elite ($14.99/mo)**: AI insights, custom templates, private Discord, priority support

## Links
- Website: https://retailbeastfx.com
- Discord: https://discord.gg/retailbeastfx
- Twitter/X: https://twitter.com/retailbeastfx
- TradingView: Search "RetailBeastFX"

## Markets Supported
- Forex (EUR/USD, GBP/USD, etc.)
- Crypto (BTC, ETH, etc.)
- Indices (NAS100, US30, etc.)
- Commodities (Gold, Oil)
